name: B3313
description:
"Tons of new features and locations to go to, have fun entering the maze...
Once again, i'd like to thank the awesome people at the discord sever for making this sm64 project possible, you guys are the best
you have no idea how thankful i am for this awesome community
Please make sure to give a follow to the awesome people mentioned in the credits, it would mean the world to me.
Link to the Game: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Z2K2NjEsaAFZTPi2fRF0b-i9CthKSQu4/view
Set to 8mb if you're on PJ64, and if you're on retroarch, idk you're a chad
Also press L in castle grounds to play as luigi tbh

Credits to hornet for making this awesome trailer

i may or may not update this in the future"

Source: ver 0.7 launch video
